rows.label: qst201617_msg0001
rows.name:
Nice one, Nanakoori! It was
worth working towards, right?

rows.label: qst201617_msg0002
rows.name:
Good job, Nanakoori! All that
hard work paid off, huh?

rows.label: qst201617_msg0003
rows.name:
Well done, Nanakoori. A great
culmination of your effort.

rows.label: qst201617_msg0004
rows.name:
Done and dusted, Nanakoori! Was
worth keeping up the lessons, eh?

rows.label: qst201617_msg0005
rows.name: Rex-kun, I...

rows.label: qst201617_msg0006
rows.name: Nia-chan, I...

rows.label: qst201617_msg0007
rows.name: Meleph-san, I...

rows.label: qst201617_msg0008
rows.name: Zeke-san, I...

rows.label: qst201617_msg0009
rows.name:
I only made it this far with
the singing thanks to you all.

rows.label: qst201617_msg0010
rows.name: It felt great. It was so much fun.

rows.label: qst201617_msg0011
rows.name:
I managed to convey how I felt
to so many people out there...

rows.label: qst201617_msg0012
rows.name: ...Thank you all so much.

rows.label: qst201617_msg0013
rows.name: We didn't do anything.

rows.label: qst201617_msg0014
rows.name:
It all happened because you believed
in yourself and gave it a shot.

rows.label: qst201617_msg0015
rows.name: Nah, this was all you.

rows.label: qst201617_msg0016
rows.name:
You worked your butt off and went
out on a limb, that's everything.

rows.label: qst201617_msg0017
rows.name: We did nothing, Nanakoori.

rows.label: qst201617_msg0018
rows.name:
You took a chance, and
worked hard to achieve
what you did. Take pride.

rows.label: qst201617_msg0019
rows.name: But we didn't do anything!

rows.label: qst201617_msg0020
rows.name:
This is all thanks to your
confidence and willingness
to try something new.

rows.label: qst201617_msg0021
rows.name:
Well... Thank you, regardless. For
believing in me, and the support...

rows.label: qst201617_msg0022
rows.name:
Thank you for helping me
find this courage inside!

rows.label: qst201617_msg0023
rows.name: Rex-kun, I hope I can make you proud!

rows.label: qst201617_msg0024
rows.name: Nia-chan, I hope I can make you proud!

rows.label: qst201617_msg0025
rows.name:
Meleph-san, I hope I
can make you proud!

rows.label: qst201617_msg0026
rows.name: Zeke-san, I hope I can make you proud!
